name: No Vacation
description:
It's 7 AM and Jeremy goes to his office for the last time before his vacation begins. He's so excited! And then...

He finds a letter on his desk.  What's in there? Jeremy's vacation is canceled! How's that possible...? Maybe it's time to talk with the Boss..

Are you ready to face the Boss? Download the game and help Jeremy to win his vacation back!

Huge thanks to our developer team: Itskyeda, Minyoung An, Phorzaeken, AAditya, Tareq, Wheat and Daliys.
